trends: There has been one other sighting in Leechburg
There were no other sightings in Leechburg on or around July 11th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsThis event happened on july 11th 2009. i was at my friends house at a party. this was located in saltsburg, on a hill basically all alone. i was in the house at the time, and my friend called me outside because they said they thought they saw a UFO. my friend is not a believer in UFO's at all, so i ran outside. as i looked up, i saw a triangular shaped craft flying slower than a plane above us. as i watched it, the triangle of lights rotated counter clockwise once. it was making no noise at all. this craft did this rotating motion randomly. it rotated about every ten seconds while flying directly above us, but as it started to get farther and farther away, it rotated less and less. almost as if showing off for us? i'm not quite sure. i was very much excited, yet scared when i saw this strange craft go by. i knew it wasn't a plane though for sure.
